eb986416d06794dd997752b402f6dc44356c28eae1bfd966217be","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://da045a86d2f16f58820223ad08e24f21f359e04bfcc91da996424704d26df6dd","dweb:/ipfs/QmQVtR6aW2YHg2k9FoioyxUr7g9bwfZiqwP1fKNiXPhXdS"]},"src/abstract/Migration.sol":{"keccak256":"0x7dc1a3dc16119deed4150ac19ec881d0b681dc7f42677abe33b3d0669d4b3a64","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://5e27ae40ab60f5221eaf8b15e15de48591a6338a5aaca4acccefba3e2d13a916","dweb:/ipfs/QmbJopeCUt98AKJknrJycp36P6sdaBzBiRHFYYY1q2FjPt"]},"src/interfaces/abstract/IGuardians.sol":{"keccak256":"0x99bce445e0004b91eef3ff74729c44e7ca839e6c6ee30f0ee8e1e4aedc4ee5c9","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://cfbf077b17e349066b27413b8da21e464782cc1f1df295310f349a278bcb45d0","dweb:/ipfs/QmaDdmugbzysBeb9M4ZLPkE2fBpVnrPomrMg2BLy8Wn5fW"]},"src/interfaces/abstract/IMigration.sol":{"keccak256":"0xd3ab4973ace82c80c056167d07f900797ccd318c60cf73b5f8afc52678ea52c6","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://bf31eb513e346b30a8f91232a8096019f17df014216d537bff60d7fdf2a44426","dweb:/ipfs/QmexHAi6FkSGy1BCx5gABd4EceJ5wA9ghr1LXut7Xvnsn3"]}},"version":1}

acceptOwnership().details: The new owner accepts the ownership transfer.

params._initialOwner: Initial owner address. Set as migrator.

returns._0: true if the contract has been migrated, false otherwise.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

pendingOwner().details: Returns the address of the pending owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Starts the ownership transfer of the contract to a new account. Replaces the pending transfer if there is one. Can only be called by the current owner.

addGuardian(address).notice: Add an address as a guardian. Only callable by owner.

constructor.notice: Set the grace period and migrator address.         Pauses contract at deployment time.

gracePeriod().notice: Period in seconds after migration during which admin can continue to call protected         migration functions. Admins can make corrections to the migrated data during the         grace period if necessary, but cannot make changes after it expires.

guardians(address).notice: Mapping of addresses to guardian status.

isMigrated().notice: Check if the contract has been migrated.

migrate().notice: Set the time of the migration and emit an event. Hubs will watch this event and         cut over to use this contract as their source of truth after this timestamp.         Only callable by the migrator.

migratedAt().notice: Timestamp at which data is migrated. Hubs will cut over to use this contract as their         source of truth after this timestamp.

pause().notice: Pause the contract. Only callable by owner or a guardian.

removeGuardian(address).notice: Remove a guardian. Only callable by owner.

setMigrator(address).notice: Set the migrator address. Only callable by owner.

unpause().notice: Unpause the contract. Only callable by owner.
